      • getAccountGroupsForSelection

        public java.util.List<AccountGroupSelection> getAccountGroupsForSelection(ID accountId)
        Description copied from interface: AccountService
        Returns the list of all account groups, together with the status for their selection in the given account ID. The account ID may not be set, meaning that none of the groups will be selected.
        Specified by:
        getAccountGroupsForSelection in interface AccountService
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account ID to get the groups for, or not set
        Returns:
        List of groups with their selection status
